00052 
00053 #ifndef AUTH_H
00054 #define AUTH_H
00055 
00056 /***********************
00057 *** PUBLIC FUNCTIONS ***
00058 ***********************/
00059 void link_required (int);               /* we are starting to use the link */
00060 void link_terminated (int);     /* we are finished with the link */
00061 void link_down (int);                   /* the LCP layer has left the Opened state */
00062 void link_established (int);    /* the link is up; authenticate now */
00063 void np_up (int, u16_t);                        /* a network protocol has come up */
00064 void np_down (int, u16_t);              /* a network protocol has gone down */
00065 void np_finished (int, u16_t);  /* a network protocol no longer needs link */
00066 void auth_peer_fail (int, u16_t);/* peer failed to authenticate itself */
00067 
00068 /* peer successfully authenticated itself */
00069 void auth_peer_success (int, u16_t, char *, int);
00070 
00071 /* we failed to authenticate ourselves */
00072 void auth_withpeer_fail (int, u16_t);
00073 
00074 /* we successfully authenticated ourselves */
00075 void auth_withpeer_success (int, u16_t);
00076 
00077 /* check authentication options supplied */
00078 void auth_check_options (void);
00079 void auth_reset (int);                  /* check what secrets we have */
00080 
00081 /* Check peer-supplied username/password */
00082 int  check_passwd (int, char *, int, char *, int, char **, int *);
00083 
00084 /* get "secret" for chap */
00085 int  get_secret (int, char *, char *, char *, int *, int);
00086 
00087 /* check if IP address is authorized */
00088 int  auth_ip_addr (int, u32_t);
00089 
00090 /* check if IP address is unreasonable */
00091 int  bad_ip_adrs (u32_t);
00092 
00093 
00094 #endif /* AUTH_H */
